BLINDSKILLROLLS.Settings.Enabled.Name: Enable Blind Skill Rolls
BLINDSKILLROLLS.Settings.Enabled.Hint: Turn the module on or off globally.
BLINDSKILLROLLS.Settings.BlindAll.Name: Blind all skills by default
BLINDSKILLROLLS.Settings.BlindAll.Hint: When enabled, all skill checks are Blind GM Rolls unless explicitly disabled per skill.
BLINDSKILLROLLS.Debug.SetRollMode: Blind Skill Rolls | Forcing roll mode to BLIND for skill: {skill}
